Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted and Addison due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 93rd/Marquette
ShortDescription: EB 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony & 93rd, due to street blockage near 93rd/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony and resume their normal route on 93rd, due to street blockage near 93rd/Marquette.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Damen. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Damen.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
